General.Name: Yuanli Chemical Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Yuanli Chemical Group Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of fine chemicals. It offers green solvents, dibasic alcohol products, special plasticizers, and coalescing agents. The company serves coating, polymer, plastic additive, pigment, pharmaceutical, and chemical industries. It sells its products in various countries and regions worldwide. The company was formerly known as Shandong Yuanli Science and Technology Co.,Ltd. Yuanli Chemical Group Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2003 and is based in Weifang, China.

2.Name: Mr. Wang  Junyu
2.Title: Deputy GM, Sales Vice GM & Director
